name: Courier Chief Tycoon
description:
Welcome to Courier Chief Tycoon !

Courier Chief Tycoon is a game that lets you build and operate your own package delivery network. It offers you all the mechanics you need to grow your business.

So what awaits you;




-Couriers that you can assign in your company,
-Different features from each other.




-Panels where you can check your stock status,
-Panels that you can order according to your needs.




-Qualified software that you can purchase from your internet network,
Each software has its own features.




-The games on the site that you can use to add a new one to your entertainment,
-Some games can earn you balance.



-Crypto panels that you can navigate when you activate the secure network access,
-You can provide additional income to your company and accelerate your development.




-Engine gallery where you can give your employees an advantage with different engines,
-Interactions where you can strengthen the engines you have.




-Notification panels where you can check your customers' comments,
-Control panels where you can deal with your customers' orders.
